mapper.select: SELECT COMM_SEQ,ONEDAY_SEQ, EMAIL,REFFER,DEPTH, STEP,REGDATE,CONTENT, REPORTCHK FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE ONEDAY_SEQ =#{oneday_seq} ORDER BY REFFER DESC, DEPTH, STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTBOARD( COMM_SEQ,ONEDAY_SEQ, EMAIL,REFFER,DEPTH, STEP,REGDATE,CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_COMM.NEXTVAL,#{oneday_seq}, #{email},(SELECT NVL(MAX(REFFER),0) FROM COMMENTBOARD)+1,0,0,SYSDATE,#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTBOARD SET STEP = STEP +1 WHERE STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMM_SEQ=#{comm_seq}) AND REFFER = (SELECT REFFER FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMM_SEQ=#{comm_seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTBOARD( COMM_SEQ,ONEDAY_SEQ,EMAIL, REFFER,DEPTH, STEP,REGDATE,CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_COMM.NEXTVAL,#{oneday_seq},#{email}, (SELECT REFFER FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMM_SEQ=#{comm_seq}),(SELECT DEPTH FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMM_SEQ = #{comm_seq})+1, (SELECT STEP FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMM_SEQ = #{comm_seq})+1,SYSDATE,#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTBOARD SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE COMM_SEQ = #{comm_seq}
